name: Vendorling
description:
Play as a Vendorling - the race that lives in all vending machines. Their job is to tally all the coins popped in.

There's always lots of customers, so make your decisions accurately and fast to keep my trouble bar from slipping in the red.

Fail to keep up and the vending machine will be out of order.

Team:

Karel Kahula - @u0999k - Developer
